This is a technique in which Shion's [[Bell (charm)|bell]] illuminates and negates any negative occurence. It was powerful enough to protect Shion from [[Mōryō]]'s darkness.

[[es:Esfera Protectora de Luz]]
[[pl:Ochronna Sfera Światła]]
[[pt-br:Esfera Protetora de Luz]]
